```{r}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("shawna-md/quercus")


# Load the package
library(nadiv)
library(dmm)

```


```{r}
data(quercus.df)
str(quercus.df)

# preprocess
quercus.mdf <- mdf(quercus.df,pedcols=c(1:3),factorcols=4,ycols=c(5:6),
               relmat=c("E","A","D"),sexcode=c(1,2))

```
